actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend accounting procedures under section 313 of the Tariff Act of 1930.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to require a drawback (refund) to be paid on the export of articles which are manufactured in the United States with the use of imported articles and are stored in common storage with articles of the same kind and quality, provided that specified requirements are met.

titles.title: To amend accounting procedures under section 313 of the Tariff Act of 1930.
